# ElectProtect

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: stable](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-stable-brightgreen.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#stable)

ElectProtect is a Shiny application built on the [bs4Dash](https://rinterface.github.io/bs4Dash/) package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of ElectProtect from Github with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("YangWu1227/elect-protect")
```
